issue.title: [Release] Don't commit doctrees in the docs post release script
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8533](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8533). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
A .gitignore file would be enough to prevent committing pickled binaries.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8533?focusedCommentId=17488160) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
This is done in the meantime (see https://github.com/apache/arrow-site/blob/asf-site/docs/.gitignore)
